profile:
We believe in customer satisfaction and doing what is right for our customers. 
Whether you are looking for a new roof replacement or roof repair, we have you covered. 
With 18 years of combined experience in the industry, GoldHIll knows how to meet and exceed
all of our customer expectations. 

We offer:
-Roof replacement
-Roof maintenance
-Roof repair
-Siding, soffit and fascia

We provide industry leading service and products for all your exterior needs and wants.

profile: CT Roofing Solutions understands how important your home and business is to you and the significant investment involved for quality roof installation or roof restoration. As a reputable and professional roofing contractor, we offer years of roofing experience that includes a complete and comprehensive range of roof services that are designed to enhance curb appeal, provide energy efficiency and increase the value of your business or commercial property.

profile:
RVP Roofing Systems Inc. is proud to offer the Armadura Metal Roof System. Completely designed and manufactured in Canada, Armadura Metal Roof is the last roof you will ever need! Aramdura Metal Roofs come with an industry leading 50 year, non-prorated warranty. Make this the last time you re-do your roof.
*
WORLD CLASS WARRANTY

With an Armadura Metal Roof you are protected like no other. Industry leading warranty backed by the manufacturer. Even if you sell your home we will support the new homeowners under the same warranty. The labour and materials are covered with our non-prorated warranty.
*
CANADIAN MADE
*
LOW RATE FINANCING

RVP Roofing Systems has you covered with competitive rate financing options. We can offer deferral payment solutions and you can pay out your investment at any time. Backed by FinanceIT (formally TD Financing), one of Canadaâ€™s premier lenders, we can help protect you and your loved ones for life.
